props.name: border
props.description: Adds a border to the card section that it's applied to

props.name: dp
props.description: Assigns variable shadow depths (2, 3, 4, 6, 8, or 16) to card

props.name: expand
props.description: Applies expand a card title container effect

props.name: noHeader
props.description: Defines div as a card title container

props.name: noFooter
props.description: Defines div as a card actions container and assigns appropriate text characteristics to actions text

props.name: hasMenu
props.description: Defines element as top right menu button

slots.name: (default)
slots.description: The default slot holds the card text and can contain HTML

slots.name: header
slots.description: The header slot holds the card title text and can contain HTML

slots.name: footer
slots.description: The footer slot holds the card inner text and can contain HTML

slots.name: menu
slots.description: The menu slot holds the card menu text and can contain HTML
